{{ fullname }}
{{ underline }}

.. currentmodule:: {{ module }}
.. autoclass:: {{ objname }}
  :show-inheritance:

  {% block methods %}
  {% if all_methods %}

  {% set public_methods = [] %}
  {% set private_methods = [] %}
  {% set skipped_methods = [] %}
  {% for m in all_methods %}
  {% if m.startswith('__') %}
  {% do skipped_methods.append(m) %}
  {% elif m in inherited_members %}
  {% do skipped_methods.append(m) %}
  {% elif m.startswith('_') %}
  {% do private_methods.append(m) %}
  {% else %}
  {% do public_methods.append(m) %}
  {% endif %}
  {%- endfor %}

  {% if public_methods %}
  .. rubric:: Public Methods

  .. autosummary::
    :toctree: .
    :nosignatures:
  {% for item in public_methods %}
     ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
  {%- endfor %}
  {% endif %}

  {% if private_methods %}
  .. rubric:: Private Methods

  .. warning::

       Private methods are mainly for internal/developer use and their API might change without notice.

  .. autosummary::
    :toctree: .
    :nosignatures:
  {% for item in private_methods %}
     ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
  {%- endfor %}
  {% endif %}

  {% endif %}
  {% endblock %}
